```{r}
library(epiprocess)
library(dplyr)
library(tsibble)

z_tibble = tibble(geo_value = 1:4, time_value = 2011:2014, signal = 0)
z_tsibble = as_tsibble(z_tibble, index = "time_value", key = "geo_value")

class(as_epi_df(z_tibble))
class(as_epi_df(z_tsibble))

head(as_epi_df(z_tibble))
head(as_epi_df(z_tsibble))

# relocate only breaks epi_df label for the tsibble
class(relocate(as_epi_df(z_tibble), time_value))
class(relocate(as_epi_df(z_tsibble), time_value))

# select only breaks epi_df label for the tsibble
class(select(as_epi_df(z_tibble), time_value))
class(select(as_epi_df(z_tsibble), time_value))
```
